name: Hook (itch) (BeardEnvy)
description:
A little skill tree based roguelite. Delve through long abandonned mines obtaining ancient knowledge to aid in handling the current inhabitants.

The skill tree is pretty varied and currently hella unbalanced but should provide you with some fun nontheless. :)

Created for my secret santa in the Secret Santa Jam 2020.

Will continue to update in my spare time. Any feedback would be appreciated. Comment below! <3

Controller support coming soon I swear! :)

Music:

Newer Wave by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7016-newer-wave
